thread.title: WATCH: Judge Jeanine Says Trump Is “Biggest Change Agent in the History of the United States”
thread.title_full: WATCH: Judge Jeanine Says Trump Is “Biggest Change Agent in the History of the United States”

author: K. Campbell
title: WATCH: Judge Jeanine Says Trump Is “Biggest Change Agent in the History of the United States”
text:
Man Is Too Excited About Inauguration… Takes His Float to The Streets Days Before 
Pointing to his “fearless campaign” and “straightforward” inaugural address, Pirro praised the president and chastised those who have sought any opportunity to criticize him or question the legitimacy of his presidency. 
In particular, Pirro countered arguments from liberal reporters like MSNBC’s Rachel Maddow, who called Trump’s inaugural address a “dark speech.” 
Pirro explained that the president was simply speaking of daily life for Americans who had not asked to be born into underprivileged circumstances, such as living in inner cities and being victimized by gang crime. Advertisement - story continues below 
As president, Trump won’t “put fingers to the wind” to decide what to do at crunch time or care how his opponents criticize him when he’s making tough decisions about the direction of our country, Pirro said. 
“He’s been up and down and back up again. He understands that … changing the Washington machine is not for the faint of heart,” she continued. 
Instead, Trump has been “unafraid” to talk about how the U.S. has failed with regard to certain issues, and he has been willing to “face those challenges head-on.” Watch Pirro’s passionate defense of President Trump here: Advertisement - story continues below
